about_the_game:
A SMALL TASTE OF DEADBEAT


After donning the Deadset, subject of morbid urban legends, a young man named Singer finds himself pulled into the bizarre world of the Hereafter!

Assaulted by Demons, Devils, and a low-budget orientation ceremony, he wanders through the Vestibule Wastes, trying to find someone who can help him with his predicament...

This demo contains the entirety of the Vestibule Wastes, the first region of Deadbeat, and its boss, the violent Bloodletter. There are two Constructs to wield, two Calls to make, and seven kinds of enemies with seven unique Waves to capture and unleash!

Your savefile will be transferable to the full game!

FEATURES:

  • Master Deadbeat's fast-paced combat!
  • Defeat enemies and equip their Waves to enhance your powers!
  • Find powerful Constructs to get the upper-hand on enemies!
  • Discover how to use your Hellphone to call down Demonic aid!
  • Face off with Deadbeat's first boss!

Dip your toes in the sea of noise. Welcome to the Deadbeat Demo.

name: Deadbeat Demo
short_description: The demo for Deadbeat, the afterlife Soulslike. Explore the industrial environs of the Vestibule Wastes, and take down every demon in your path!
